topic: Scheduling Issues with Exams and Thesis Requirements
question: I am facing a scheduling conflict with two upcoming exams, and I must take both to meet my credit requirements. I am near completion of my degree and urge for advice on how to manage this situation effectively, considering I have started my master thesis."
answer: Unfortunately, you will need to choose one exam to participate in. Please provide your examination report and study documents so I can better assess your situation. It would be beneficial for you to join our open consultation hours to discuss your options in detail.
